Message:
“Working is very tough.
It’s not all fun and games.”

That was what my sister wrote
in one of the letters she used
to send me.

But those letters,
and the remittances she sent
with them stopped coming
a while ago...

I wonder if my sisters also had
the same troubles I’m having...

“You’re a hard worker, Monica.
I’m sure you’ll do great.”

That’s what my mother
always used to say, but...
I feel like I’m about to break.
No one taught me any of this...!
No matter how hard I try,

that hard work will
never pay off...
because I’m a witch.

then is there any point
in trying at all?
